mapper.insert: insert into airline(takeoffDate, airline, flightName, flightNum, dest, takeoffTime, gateAlpha, gateNum, takeoffTimeNew, remark, managerTel, note) values (#{takeoffDate}, #{airline}, #{flightName}, #{flightNum}, #{dest}, #{takeoffTime}, #{gateAlpha}, #{gateNum}, #{takeoffTimeNew}, #{remark}, #{managerTel}, #{note})
mapper.select: select * from airline order by id desc
